experience: You and 'Steven both know John Furrier, Eric Keosky-Smith, and 171 others
Field Underwriter, Life and Health LUTCF

I help singles and families with retirement, mortgage protection, Index and guarenteed Annuities, disability income, Index Universal Life insurance,  Whole life and Term Insurance along with several health insurance packages. As a independent agent writting for over 10 different companies, I can make sure you are getting the Best coverage for the best cost.
Field Underwriter. Life and Health LUTCF
Retirement Income Planning, Mortgage Protection, Final Expenses, Life and Health Insurance planning.
Life, sickness & Heath licensed Insurance agent
I am currently licensed for Life and Health insurance.

Each buyer is different with special financial needs or even credit issues. With a dozen Finance professionals on myside I can help most buyers find the money they need.  Multi Million dollar buyers to Military buyers, they all have different Financial needs.  Processing home searches for buyers and finding them homes is a small part to the process. I set up Home inspections, pest inspections, escrow, etc. for buyers. We have even helped enroll kids into schools for clients. It goes on and on and I am sure you personally have been down this road yourself. Sometimes this is a very stressful time for the buyers since this is their largest financial purchase but we try to make the transition seamless without any surprises. Give me a call at 480-329-0975 to get started!

I started Shaw's fence company as a single father of three girls. I added a person and another one, then started using a PEO to provide employees. I kept getting more jobs, and started providing Finance alternatives to clients. I wore many hats from biding jobs and giving estimates, keeping insurance up to date, updating trucks, trailers, purchasing a building for the company, phone systems, alarm systems, training employees was a nonstop issue, along with keeping the books and money up to date and correct. You can go to (Manta Shaw's Custom Fence) to check my name, dates, and income. I sold the company in 2000 and moved to Cave Creek, AZ.
